title: The Salinas Jackpot
description: An insurance company hires Cannon to track down the men who robbed a rodeo of $100,000.

title: Death Chain
description: Hired to investigate a bank secretary's murder, Cannon unearths a scheme involving blackmail and robbery.

title: Call Unicorn
description: When a series of costly truck hijackings leads to murder, Cannon's brought in to capture the thieves.

title: Country Blues
description: When a beloved country singer is killed in a suspicious plane crash, an insurance company hires Cannon to investigate.

title: Scream of Silence
description: A millionaire's son is targeted for kidnapping and only Cannon can save him.

title: Fool's Gold
description: Hired to track down an armored car robber, Cannon is surprised to discover a small town is harboring and protecting the thief.

title: Girl in the Electric Coffin
description: When his investigator friend dies while searching for a missing girl, Cannon agrees to take over the case.

title: Dead Pigeon
description: Framed for a murder he didn't commit, a police detective asks Cannon to unmask the real killer.

title: A Lonely Place to Die
description: While investigating a triple homicide, Cannon discovers a syndicate leader may be the next victim.

title: No Pockets in a Shroud
description: An attorney hampers Cannon's investigation into a case involving an eccentric millionaire and his missing heir.

title: Stone, Cold Dead
description: A missing bicycle may provide the clue Cannon needs to exonerate a Vietnam veteran accused of murder.

title: Death Is a Double-Cross
description: A simple assignment turns deadly when Cannon is hired to protect a millionaire's daughter and her children on a train ride to L.A.

title: The Nowhere Man
description: Deciding to teach the world about its dangers, an accountant steals a canister of deadly nerve gas.

title: Flight Plan
description: Posing as a political refugee, an embezzler cons Cannon into helping him flee the country.

title: Devil's Playground
description: Months after being injured while chasing a payroll holdup suspect, an ex-motorcycle cop hires Cannon to help him find the robber, who was assumed to have died in the chase.

title: Treasure of San Ignacio
description: Cannon calls on a retired detective to help him recover religious relics stolen in an armed robbery of a church in Mexico.

title: Blood on the Vine
description: Cannon is called by a winemaker's secretary after several suspicious accidents happen to the vintner.

title: To Kill a Guinea Pig
description: A medical researcher, who has a research project at a prison, is being intimidated by thugs, and Cannon is hired to find out why.

title: The Island Caper
description: Cannon attempts to help an ex-con, who he put away years before, when the man is coerced into a bank robbery.

title: A Deadly Quiet Town
description: Cannon is hired by a man concerned that his daughter is involved with a cult of college-age kids.

title: A Flight of Hawks
description: Pete Macklin, a former fighter pilot, is fired upon by a warplane while he is driving on a canyon road, resulting in a crash and his death. Cannon is hired by the insurance company to prove his death was a suicide.

title: The Torch
description: When a clothing manufacturer is accused of arson and murder, his daughter hires Cannon to find who actually did the deed and to exonerate her father.

title: Cain's Mark
description: Cannon is hired by a woman to find her ex-con son, who claims he saw illegal weapons in crates at his brother's manufacturing plant.

title: Murder by Moonlight
description: Convicted felon Mike Carr attends college under a prison rehab program. The incarcerated crime boss John Slater forces Carr to ferry information to and from his outside people. Cannon agrees to help Carr break free of Slater's control.

title: Bad Cats and Sudden Death
description: Deputy District Attorney Michael Arnold is accused of murdering his wife, and he calls on Cannon help him.

title: Sky Above, Death Below
description: A union leader is killed on a Colorado ski lift, and his daughter hires Cannon to get to the truth.

title: Bitter Legion
description: An laid-off engineer trains a group of Vietnam veterans to steal munitions from a National Guard armory, and Cannon is hired by the wife of one of them to find her missing husband.

title: That Was No Lady
description: Cannon is hired to protect a lawyer who has received death threats after defending her clients, two small-time crooks, suspected of a safe-cracking at a charitable foundation.

title: Stakeout
description: Cannon witnesses the attempted holdup of a bar and shoots the thief before he escapes. The man was with a woman who accidentally shoots her in the gunfight. The woman later claims she didn't know the man and that it was Cannon who shot her.

title: The Predators
description: A sheep rancher is accused of criminal negligence when a man is killed on her property by a "coyote getter" trap, and she calls on Cannon to exonerate her.

title: A Long Way Down
description: A doctor at an inner-city hospital is suspected in a drug theft, and Cannon is hired by the hospital administrator to get to the truth.

title: The Rip Off
description: A professional thief breaks into Frank's apartment and steals all of his furniture, including his file cabinet.

title: Child of Fear
description: Cannon is hired by the wife of a missing ranch owner when his privately hired security service somehow hasn't been able to find him for six days.

title: The Shadow Man
description: Cannon is hired by the wife of a hotel developer after he falls off a cliff and, while she goes for help, disappears.

title: Hear No Evil
description: A paroled electronics expert is threatened by three businessmen, and his wife, an ex-cop, calls Cannon.

title: The Endangered Species
description: Cannon's friend, a yacht builder, is framed for killing his son on a hunting trip.

title: Nobody Beats the House
description: Cannon is hired to help a man avoid paying his gambling debt with his life.

title: Hard Rock Roller Coaster
description: Cannon is hired to help a man who wandered into someone's home after being beaten up. He has no memory or any I.D. on him. Two thugs are after him and one of his benefactors may have a secret agenda.

title: The Dead Samaritan
description: A bystander is charged after he sees a woman being assaulted by a businessman, he intervenes, and the businessman dies of a heart attack. But was it a set-up?

title: Death of a Stone Seahorse
description: A marine biologist is stabbed on a research island.

title: Moving Target
description: To protect an author whose life has been threatened, Cannon puts him in a motor-home to finish his manuscript and investigates who might want the writer dead.

title: Murder for Murder
description: Cannon is hired by the sister of a young woman who died at the mansion of two brothers who own a cosmetics company.

title: To Ride a Tiger
description: After a lawyer working on a controversial case disappears Cannon is hired to help find him. The lawyer is a diabetic and may die if he isn't found in time.

title: Prisoners
description: Cannon is hired by the parents of a young man held in a Turkish prison on drug charges.

roles.char: Man in Turkish restaurant playing Backgammon

title: The Seventh Grave
description: A newspaper publisher calls Cannon to the small town of Milling to investigate a series of murders of young women.

title: Catch Me If You Can
description: A psychopath calls and hires Cannon to stop him from killing again, because he can't stop himself.

title: Press Pass to the Slammer
description: When a reporter is threatened with jail time for refusing to reveal her source to the grand jury, she hires Cannon to prove her story without using that source.

title: Deadly Heritage
description: Cannon is hired by a woman to find her husband's illegitimate son, who is bitter that he grew up in an orphanage instead of with her wealthy family.

title: He Who Digs a Grave
description: Cannon investigates an alleged murder-suicide involving rich and powerful families in a small town.

title: Memo from a Dead Man
description: After swerving down a mountain road for several miles, Walter Shaw drives his Jaguar sedan into a ravine and is killed. By the terms of his will, Cannon is hired to determine if one of his beneficiaries was responsible.

title: Hounds of Hell
description: Cannon is hired to investigate two fatal dog attacks on former Vietnam combat unit members, and to stop another attack.

title: Target in the Mirror
description: Cannon turns down a client, and when she is killed in her house shortly after his visit, he is drawn into both her murder investigation and the reason she called him.

title: Murder by Proxy
description: Cannon is hired by a woman who was slipped a mickey at a bar and then framed for murder.

title: Night Flight to Murder
description: Cannon is hired by an insurance company to investigate the disappearance, while on final approach at a small Utah airstrip, of a twin-engine plane that was carrying $3 million of negotiable bonds.

title: Come Watch Me Die
description: A convicted murderer escapes from the state hospital for the criminally insane, and Cannon is hired to find him before the police do.

title: Perfect Alibi
description: A businessman's office is burglarized, the safe cracked, and the cash payroll stolen. A former business partner is the obvious suspect, due to his knowledge of the office layout and safe combination, but he has an alibi: he was in prison at the time.

title: Dead Lady's Tears
description: A man's model/girlfriend is murdered in her apartment shortly after she tells him she's leaving for a New York job, and he hires Cannon to exonerate him.

title: The Limping Man
description: A man with a limp is intercepted at the airport by police, but he inexplicably escapes while held at gunpoint by a cop, an old police buddy of Cannon's.

title: Trial by Terror
description: When a criminal on trial, kidnaps the daughter of the judge to get him to dismiss the case. He then calls Frank to find his daughter before he is forced to make that choice.

title: Murder by the Numbers
description: A wealthy middle-aged woman's fiancé disappears shortly before their scheduled wedding, and she hires Cannon to find him.

title: Valley of the Damned
description: A man from a Montana Indian reservation is accused of a murder at the airplane hangar where he works, and the local Indian Center hires Cannon to investigate.

title: A Well Remembered Terror
description: A young couple hires Cannon to find out why they are being terrorized by a mysterious stranger. Cannon discovers the answer goes back three years to an unsolved hijacking.

title: Arena of Fear
description: Ron Johnson, a prizefighter training for an upcoming bout, punches a heckler in a tavern and kills him. The niece of Ron's trainer hires Cannon to sort out the case.

title: Photo Finish
description: Cannon is hired by General O'Hara to find who killed his brother, Paul Dunbar, several years before.

title: Duel in the Desert
description: Cannon is hired to handle a nighttime ransom delivery. After being led to various isolated phone booths by the kidnapper, Frank is slugged by the kidnapper's henchman, but he escapes and awakens the next morning in the desert with no memory of who he is or why he is there.

title: Where's Jennifer?
description: A wealthy young woman hires Cannon to find her sister Jennifer, who supposedly drowned five years ago.

title: Blood Money
description: A young doctor arrives at a prison to examine a prisoner. During the examination the prisoner reaches into the doctor's bag and removes a pistol. Cannon is hired to prove the doctor was an unwitting participant in the attempted jailbreak.

title: Death of a Hunter
description: Malcolm Lawrence is killed at his African wildlife park by a lion that was supposedly tranquilized, and his wife hires Cannon to find out if he was murdered.

title: The Cure That Kills
description: Cannon investigates the death of two women who were connected to a faith healer who preaches to his flock that modern medicine is the work of Satan. A young man with a brain tumor may be the next victim.

title: Bobby Loved Me
description: A small-time con man is murdered, and his girlfriend hires Cannon to find the killer.

title: Triangle of Terror
description: Cannon is called to the West Indies by Jackie Akers to investigate the death of her father, Sir Arnold Masters.

title: The Stalker
description: While on a vacation at a remote fishing lodge, Cannon is stalked by an escaped serial murderer.

title: Kelly's Song
description: Cannon enlists the help of a former call girl to catch her former pimp, who killed a cop.

title: The Hit Man
description: Cannon is hired by a hit man to take his place, but he wants Cannon to save his mark, not kill him.

title: Voice from the Grave
description: Cannon looks into a 14-year-old nightclub homicide investigation after a retired detective is the target of an attempted hit.

title: Lady in Red
description: Cannon is hired by a businessman to follow his wife as she carries negotiable bonds, and he is drawn into a complex scheme involving false identities and murder.

title: The Deadly Trail
description: Cannon is hired by a wealthy retired general to find a daughter he hasn't seen since she was a child, 20 years ago.

title: The Exchange
description: To avenge the killing of his younger brother, a man kidnaps a police cadet to exchange for the Police Lieutenant he blames for his death.

title: The Avenger
description: A detective, who was tailing a man as a favor for Frank, is shot when the man meets his drug dealer. Frank must find the man before the detective's brother kills him.

title: A Killing in the Family
description: Cannon is hired by an insurance company representative to investigate a fatal automobile accident, but nothing about the accident is as it seems . . . and neither is the insurance company representative.

title: The Man Who Couldn't Forget
description: Cannon finds himself between Nazi hunters and their quarry, and he finds they don't want justice, they want revenge.

title: The Sounds of Silence
description: A young woman hires Cannon to find her fiancé, after he disappears, and his business partners refuse to reveal where he is.

title: Daddy's Little Girl
description: Cannon shoots and kills mob hit-man Gianni at a restaurant, and Gianni's girlfriend, the syndicate head's daughter, wants Cannon killed for it.

title: The Conspirators
description: A young woman has gone missing and Cannon is hired to find her. The four men responsible for her death frame a young black man for it and Cannon sets out to clear him.

title: Coffin Corner
description: Cannon flies to Tampa, Florida, to find a man who abruptly withdrew a large sum of money from his bank account and then disappeared with two gunmen on his heels.

title: Perfect Fit for a Frame
description: Cannon is hired by a San Diego industrialist to protect his daughter from a psychotic man, and then he gets framed for killing the man.

title: Killer on the Hill
description: A construction contractor is framed for attempted murder of a politician, and his wife hires Cannon to find out by whom and why.

title: A Touch of Venom
description: A group of terrorists have drugged Cannon with a poison, giving him 72 hours to give them a defector and receive the antidote or die.

title: The Star
description: When the son of a famous actress disappears the police think its another instance of his recurring drug problem. Cannon is hired to find him, but no one is telling him the whole truth.
